utils.database module

utils.database.check_db_connection()[source]

Check the database connection and measure the service uptime.

This function attempts to establish a connection with the database and runs a basic query to verify connectivity. It also calculates the elapsed time since the database initialization.

Returns:

A tuple containing: - A boolean indicating the connection status (True if successful, False otherwise). - The elapsed time since the database was initialized (in seconds), or None if the connection fails.

Return type:

tuple(bool, float or None)

utils.database.init_db(app)[source]

Initialize the database with the Flask application.

This function sets up the SQLAlchemy database connection, configures the database URI, and creates the necessary tables based on the registered models.

Parameters:

app (flask.Flask) – The Flask application instance.

Raises:

Exception – If there is an error in setting the database URI.
